name: positive-vibes
description: A minimal Electron application written with Typescript

scripts.clean: npm i --save-dev rimraf && rimraf ./build/ ./dist ./node_modules/ && npm ci
scripts.startDev: npm run build && cross-env DEBUG_ENABLED=true electron ./dist/main.js
scripts.package-linux: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --config ./electron-builder.json --linux
scripts.package-win: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --config ./electron-builder.json --win
scripts.package-mac: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --config ./electron-builder.json --mac

author: ScrewTSW
